summary: Adds new audio to the "vampire feed" audio
descriptionHtml:
Ok, so this adds a clip of audio to the end of the "vampire feed" sound. What it adds is audio from Vampire's Kiss starring Nicolas Cage. Nicolas Cage yells through the street 'I'm a Vampire! I'm a Vampire!' So I decided to add it to the feed audio.

This is meant for fun, if you're not into anything that breaks immersion this probably isn't for you.

For people who haven't seen the movie here is a clip of it.
[youtube]Lct6x-XqWrw[/youtube]

And here is a clip of it in action;
[youtube]FX8O7exiphc[/youtube]

After feeding, I like to run around the house as the audio plays, makes it funnier.

My other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6677] How to add standalone armor [/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7366] Finding Nemo Mudcrabs [/url]
author: Lateraliss
